name: Entangled (itch) (Janblu Poggio)
description:
A turn based strategy game with a twist, you can link pieces together to make them stronger! Be careful, however, as if one of them dies, the other also dies.

Made in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2021

How to play:
Point and click.
A: Attack
M: Move
I: Idle (do nothing)
U: Undo
Link!: Link pieces together: Select the other piece you want to link to, and press Link! again.

I overshot this by a lot brooooo

Honestly, at least it exists
